definition: see 天差地遠|天差地远[tian1 cha1 di4 yuan3]
day/sky/heaven
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
a complete contrast/totally different
huge difference
as different as heaven and earth (idiom)/worlds apart
no less than from heaven to the abyss (idiom); differing widely/worlds apart/the gap couldn't be bigger
(literary) far more than/not limited to
to act in a way that defeats one's purpose (idiom)
lit. to use a sacred tripod as cooking pot and jade as ordinary stone (idiom); fig. a waste of precious material/casting pearls before swine
ravenous wolves hold the road (idiom); wicked people in power/a vicious tyranny rules the land
cannot be deemed/unexpectedly
facing a wall, an imaginary construction (idiom); baseless fabrication
to eat sb's flesh and sleep on their hide (idiom); to swear revenge on sb/implacable hatred/to have sb's guts for garters
lit. an ant trying to shake a big tree (idiom)/fig. to overrate one's own strength/also written 蚍蜉撼樹|蚍蜉撼树[pi2 fu2 han4 shu4]
a black stallion or possibly a yellow mare (idiom); don't judge by outward appearance
the wolf runs and the wild boar rushes (idiom); crowds of evil-doers mill around like wild beasts
endlessly/to have no choice
to put a square peg in a round hole/incompatible (idiom)
